name: Will You Wheel?
description:
"Will You Wheel?" is a game where you can buy junk cars and build them for races using tuning parts like turbos, air filters, or exhaust components. It's a life simulator that includes racing.

Fix your broken car to start the game. Earn money through odd jobs and upgrade your car by ordering parts. Customize it for street racing, rally competitions, or restore it to factory condition. Use a truck to get parts and tow your project car from the junkyard.

Key features include:

Full car assembly with a variety of parts
Detailed driving and engine simulation
Random paying jobs to cover food, beverage, and fuel expenses
Drag, Drift, Street, and Rally racing options
Buy real estate such as houses, garages, and shops
And much more!
